summary: REQ-2 and parts of REQ-3 appear addressed by removing blocking intro logic at the App level and shifting HomePage to render an authenticated shell while actor/data initialize. REQ-4 is only partially evidenced: there are opt-in perf diagnostics for the first completion of folders/files/missions queries, but the diff summary does not provide clear evidence for identity restoration timing or actor-initialization-to-ready timing logs. Several unrelated UI/feature additions (PWA config, major CSS/theme changes, dev smoke test trigger, new icons) appear beyond the stated scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Emit opt-in performance timing logs for identity restoration/initialization.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows perfDiag instrumentation for initial folders/files/missions queries, but no changes or logs are shown for the identity restoration path (e.g., within useInternetIdentity or equivalent).
evidence: frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx (imports perfDiag but truncated; no identity timing shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Emit opt-in performance timing logs for actor initialization to ready.
missing_requirements.reason: ActorContext imports perfDiag and records an initStartTime, but the provided truncated excerpt does not show perfDiag start/end timing tied to actor initialization completing (status ready). Without explicit evidence of log/timing emission, this requirement cannot be confirmed as implemented.
evidence: frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx (truncated; shows initStartTime but no perfDiag calls in excerpt)

hallucinated_features.description: Dev-only core flows smoke test runnable via URL param (runSmokeTest=true) with toast + console output.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; scope is startup responsiveness and performance logging, not adding test harness triggers.

hallucinated_features.description: PWA configuration updates in the HTML entry point (favicons / apple-touch-icon / PWA-related config).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and outside startup/login responsiveness requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Major global styling/theme system changes (OKLCH color system, mobile-only layout constraints, animations).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; could be considered a redesign beyond startup/loading responsiveness.

hallucinated_features.description: New/changed decorative/animated icon component (AnimatedGalleryIcon) and related header UI changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; adds new visual features unrelated to startup responsiveness requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Folder dialog deprecation/backward-compatibility component changes (FoldersDialog) with swipe actions and delete confirmation UI behavior changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; requirements focus on startup/loading responsiveness, not folder dialog UX overhaul.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup dialog text translation to English.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to startup responsiveness requirements.
